verses.text: \w Now|strong="H8085"\w* \w Shephatiah|strong="H8203"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mattan|strong="H4977"\w*, \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pashhur|strong="H6583"\w*, \w Jucal|strong="H3116"\w* \f + \fr 38:1 \ft Jucal is a variant of Jehucal; see Jeremiah 37:3.\f* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pashhur|strong="H6583"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Malchijah|strong="H4441"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w had|strong="H5971"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w telling|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

“\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Whoever|strong="H4191"\w* \w stays|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w plague|strong="H1698"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w whoever|strong="H4191"\w* surrenders \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \f + \fr 38:2 \ft That is, the Babylonians; also in verses 18, 19, and 23\f* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w*; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* retain \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w war|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w capture|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w ought|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w discouraging|strong="H7503"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w warriors|strong="H4421"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w well|strong="H7965"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*; \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w seeking|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w well-being|strong="H7965"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w ruin|strong="H7451"\w*.”

“\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w*,” replied \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w*. “\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* \w do|strong="H3201"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* stop \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w dropped|strong="H7993"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w into|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cistern \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Malchiah|strong="H4441"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* king’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w guard|strong="H4307"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* lowered \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w ropes|strong="H2256"\w* \w into|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cistern, \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3947"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w mud|strong="H2916"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w sank|strong="H2883"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w into|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w mud|strong="H2916"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3569"\w*,\f + \fr 38:7 \ft Probably from the upper Nile region\f* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w court|strong="H1004"\w* \w official|strong="H5631"\w* \f + \fr 38:7 \ft Or eunuch\f* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* been \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* cistern. \w While|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*,

\w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*,

“\w My|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w acted|strong="H6213"\w* \w wickedly|strong="H7489"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w dropped|strong="H7993"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cistern, \w where|strong="H8478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* starve \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3569"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w men|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w here|strong="H2088"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* pull \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* cistern \w before|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w dies|strong="H4191"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w men|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w* \w below|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* storehouse. \w From|strong="H3027"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w old|strong="H1094"\w* \w rags|strong="H4418"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w worn-out|strong="H1094"\w* \w clothes|strong="H5499"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* lowered \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w ropes|strong="H2256"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* cistern.

\w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3569"\w* cried \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, “\w Put|strong="H7760"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w worn-out|strong="H1094"\w* \w rags|strong="H4418"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w clothes|strong="H5499"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w arms|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* pad \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w ropes|strong="H2256"\w*.” \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*,

\w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w they|strong="H2691"\w* \w pulled|strong="H4900"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w ropes|strong="H2256"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* cistern. \w And|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w guard|strong="H4307"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w entrance|strong="H3996"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* going \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w something|strong="H1697"\w*,” \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*. “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3947"\w* \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \w anything|strong="H1697"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.”

“\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* replied, “\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*. \w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H3289"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w advice|strong="H3289"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w secretly|strong="H5643"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, “\w As|strong="H6213"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, nor \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w seeking|strong="H1245"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘If \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3808"\w* \w surrender|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon, \w then|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w down|strong="H8313"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w survive|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* if \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w surrender|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon, \w then|strong="H3318"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H8313"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* grasp.’”

\w But|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* said \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, “\w I|strong="H5414"\w* am \w afraid|strong="H1672"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w deserted|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w abuse|strong="H5953"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.”
